CustomProfile.Description: After Dark is a 2013 light‑gun shooter from UNIS where you play as a pair of monster hunters collecting bounties. Inspired by games like Deadstorm Pirates, it uses mounted guns and a steering wheel to guide your carriage through haunted environments while blasting vampires, werewolves and other creatures of the night. The monster‑hunting theme and variety of enemies make After Dark stand out among rail shooters.
